space.arim.bans.api

Interface PunishmentPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    space.arim.universal.registry.Registrable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArimBansLibrary

    public interface PunishmentPlugin
extends space.arim.universal.registry.Registrable
    A generic punishment plugin for developers who wish to use the Punishment
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getRegistry

        space.arim.universal.registry.Registry getRegistry()
        Retrieves the Registry instance associated with this plugin.

        The corresponding events manager, retrievable with Registry.getEvents(), should be used for event listening and firing.
        Returns:
        a Registry instance

      • getNextAvailablePunishmentId

        int getNextAvailablePunishmentId()
        The next available punishment ID.

        To prevent ID conflicts, this method should be used for Punishment construction.
        Returns:
        the next ID

      • getApplicableBan

        PunishmentResult getApplicableBan(UUID uuid,
                                  String address)
        Gets a possible ban for a player and address
        Parameters:
        uuid - the player's UUID
        address - the player's IP address
        Returns:
        a PunishmentResult with a possible ban

      • getApplicableMute

        PunishmentResult getApplicableMute(UUID uuid,
                                   String address)
        Gets a possible mute for a player and address
        Parameters:
        uuid - the player's UUID
        address - the player's IP address
        Returns:
        a PunishmentResult with a possible mute

      • getApplicableWarns

        Set<Punishment> getApplicableWarns(UUID uuid,
                                   String address)
        Gets all warns for a player and address
        Parameters:
        uuid - the player's UUID
        address - the player's IP address
        Returns:
        set of warns, empty if none found

      • getApplicableKicks

        Set<Punishment> getApplicableKicks(UUID uuid,
                                   String address)
        Gets all kicks for a player and address
        Parameters:
        uuid - the player's UUID
        address - the player's IP address
        Returns:
        set of kicks, empty if none found

      • getActivePunishments

        Set<Punishment> getActivePunishments()
        Returns an umodifiable active punishments set
        Returns:
        a backed set of active punishments

      • getActivePunishmentsCopy

        default Set<Punishment> getActivePunishmentsCopy()
        A copy of the active punishments
        Returns:
        a deep clone of the set of the active punishments

      • getHistoryPunishments

        Set<Punishment> getHistoryPunishments()
        Returns an unmodifiable punishment history set
        Returns:
        a backed set of historical punishments

      • getHistoryPunishmentsCopy

        default Set<Punishment> getHistoryPunishmentsCopy()
        A copy of punishment history
        Returns:
        a deep clone of the set of historical punishments

      • addPunishments

        void addPunishments(Punishment... punishments)
             throws ConflictingPunishmentException
        Adds punishments to the backend server.
        Parameters:
        punishments - the punishments to add
        Throws:
        ConflictingPunishmentException - if punishments conflict in ID or type

      • removePunishments

        void removePunishments(Punishment... punishments)
                throws MissingPunishmentException
        Removes punishments from the backend server
        Parameters:
        punishments - the punishments to remove
        Throws:
        MissingPunishmentException - if any of the punishments aren't found

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(UUID player,
                 String... messages)
        Sends a message to a player by his/her UUID
        Parameters:
        player - the uuid of the target player
        messages - the content to send

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(Subject subject,
                 String... messages)
        Sends a message to a Subject, parsing potential Json messages if enabled
        Parameters:
        subject - the target of the message
        messages - the content to send

      • getConsole

        default Subject getConsole()
        Returns the server console Subject
        Careful! The console has unbounded permissions.
        Returns:
        a Subject representing the console
